---
name: Refactor request
about: Suggest improvements to existing code, structure, or performance
title: "[IMPROVEMENT] - Improvement request"
labels: refactor
assignees: ''

---

## Summary
Provide a concise description of the refactor or improvement you are requesting.

## Motivation
Explain why this change is needed.  
Examples: improving performance, readability, maintainability, reducing complexity, etc.

## Proposed Change
Describe what should be modified and how.  
Be specific about which files, classes, or functions are affected.

## Benefits
Explain the positive outcomes of the refactor.  
Examples: faster execution, clearer code, fewer allocations, simpler API, etc.

## Potential Risks (Optional)
List any risks or concerns associated with this change.  
Examples: breaking changes, regression risk, significant rewrite, etc.

## Additional Context (Optional)
Add any extra details, examples, or references that support the request.
